page.title: 09FAIRWATER SHOPS
page.content: FAIRWATER SHOPS ARE ABOUT 1.5 KM FROM CWMBRAN TOWN CENTRE.THEY SERVE HOUSING ESTATES ROUND THEM.THERE ARE 15 SHOPS.OUR CLASS DID A SURVEY ON MAY 24th OF THE CUSTOMERS.WE COUNTED PEOPLE USING THEM AND INTERVIEWED THEM.THE BUSIEST SHOPS WERE THE NEWSAGENT THE SUPERMARKET AND THE CHEMIST.LESS BUSY WERE THOSE SELLING CHIPS,PET FOOD,HARDWARE AND BREAD AND THE COUNCIL HOUSING OFFICE AND LAUNDRETTE.THOSE WITH FEW CUSTOMERS WERE THE BUTCHERS,OPTICIAN GREENGROCER AND TWO HAIRDRESSERS.WE THINK THESE FIVE SHOPS WERE LEAST BUSY BECAUSE CWMBRAN TOWN CENTRE IS SO CLOSE.SHOPPERS TOLD US THEY DO WEEKLY FOOD SHOPPING ON THURSDAY AND FRIDAY (PAY DAY).MOST PEOPLE THOUGHT THE SHOPS WERE EXPENSIVE AND THEY USED THE TOWN CENTRE AS WELL.
